trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANKJN605_03001_SEQ_00<tab>Zukin is a picture of panic.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANKJN605_03001_TODO_00<tab>Rescue the hot-headed Kojin on the Isle of Zekki.

TEXT_BANKJN605_03001_ZUKIN_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, we have a situation! A band of Red have made off with merchandise due to be delivered to Kokajiya...and that isn't the worst of it.

TEXT_BANKJN605_03001_ZUKIN_000_001<tab>Seeking to reclaim the stolen articles, one of our hot-headed brothers struck out for the Isle of Zekki, but he is slow to return. I fear for his life. Please, find him and bring him back safely!
TEXT_BANKJN605_03001_HOTTURTLE03001_000_015<tab>Y-You are of the Divine Circle? My thanks!

TEXT_BANKJN605_03001_HOTTURTLE03001_000_016<tab>Were it not for your timely intervention, our merchandise would have been lost, never mind my life. But come, let us quit this place ere more Red appear.

TEXT_BANKJN605_03001_ZUKIN_000_020<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, pleased am I to see you hale and whole. Our hot-headed brother, too, returned a short while ago, none the worse for his ill-conceived foray, and with the merchandise intact.
TEXT_BANKJN605_03001_ZUKIN_000_021<tab>While it is enough that none of us came to harm, I am grateful that we will be able to fulfill our trade obligations. You have my humblest thanks.
